help.remove-instruction: Remove a segment you’re pointing at
help.change-instruction: Change width of a segment you’re pointing at

share.sign-in-link: {signInLink} for nicer links to your streets and your personal street gallery
share.link: Copy and paste this link to share:
share.save-byline: For including in a report, blog, etc.

messages.my-street: Check out my street, {streetName}, on Streetmix!
messages.my-street-unnamed: Check out my street on Streetmix!
messages.someone-elses-street-unnamed: Check out this street by {streetCreator} on Streetmix!
messages.anonymous-creator-street-unnamed: Check out this street on Streetmix!

contact.email: Send an email to Streetmix team

feedback.message-placeholder: What do you think of Streetmix?
feedback.error: We’re sorry, there was a problem sending feedback at this time. Please try again later.

profile.label: Profile
profile.username-description: Your username is a unique account identifier.
profile.display-name-description: Your display name is how you appear to other users in Streetmix.
profile.display-name-not-set: You have not added a display name yet.
profile.display-name-error: Display name could not be saved

msg.slow-connection-1: Streetmix wasn’t able to connect to the Internet in awhile now.
msg.slow-connection-2: You might want to reload the page and try again. Please note you might lose the latest change to the street. Sorry!
msg.no-connection: Streetmix is having trouble connecting to the Internet.

error.page-not-found-description: Oh, boy. There is no page with this address!
error.street-not-found-description: Oh, boy. There is no street with this link!
error.street-not-found-but-user-description: There is no street with this link! But you can look at other streets by {user}
error.street-deleted-description: There is no longer a street with this link, but you can look at other streets by {user}
error.reload-sign-out-title: You signed out in another window.
error.gallery-street-failure-description: We’re having trouble loading this street.
error.reload-sign-in-title: You signed in in another window.
error.please-reload: Please reload this page to return to Streetmix.
error.survey-finished: Survey complete. Congratulations and thank you!
error.street-deleted-elsewhere-title: This street has been deleted elsewhere.
error.street-deleted-elsewhere-description: This street has been deleted in another browser.
error.auth-expired: We automatically signed you out due to inactivity.
error.access-denied-description: You cancelled the sign in process.
error.auth-api-problem-title: There was a problem with signing you in.
error.auth-api-problem-description: There was a problem with authentication.
error.please-try-again: Please try again later or let us know via <email_link>email</email_link> or <tweet_link>Twitter</tweet_link>.
error.please-try-again-contact-us: Please try again later. If you still need help, please contact us.
error.unsupported-browser-title: Streetmix doesn’t work on your browser.
error.unsupported-browser-description: Sorry about that. You might want to try <chrome_link>Chrome</chrome_link>, <firefox_link>Firefox</firefox_link>, <edge_link>Microsoft Edge</edge_link>, or Safari.
error.unsupported-browser-internet-explorer: Are you on Internet Explorer? Find out more.
error.unsupported-browser-contact-us: If you think your browser should be supported, please contact us.
error.cannot-create-new-street-on-phone-title: Streetmix works on tablets and desktops only.
error.cannot-create-new-street-on-phone-descri: If you follow another link to a specific street, you can view it on your phone – but you cannot yet create new streets.

error.heading: Oops!
error.text: Something unexpected happened 😢. We’ve logged the error, but if you can remember what happened on the way here, please tell us about it. This could also be a temporary problem, so please try one more time.

new.intro: Design, remix, and share your neighborhood street. Add trees or bike paths, widen sidewalks or traffic lanes, learn how your decisions can impact your community.
new.instruction: Start by moving some segments around.
new.instruct: Start by moving some segments around with {pointer}.

existing.instruct: Remix it by moving some segments around, or {startYourOwnStreet}.

new-street.heading: Here’s your new street.
new-street.last: Start with a copy of last street

about.heading: About Streetmix.
about.description: Design, remix, and share your street. Add bike paths, widen sidewalks or traffic lanes, learn how all of this can impact your community.

analytics.heading: Analytics
analytics.street-summary: Your street has an estimated average traffic of {averageTotal} people per hour, and potential for up to {potentialTotal} people per hour.
analytics.typical-lane-width: Capacity values are based on {laneWidth}-wide lanes.
analytics.toggle-visible: Show capacity counts in segment labels
analytics.settings-notice: Street owners can change these settings.

save.heading: Save as image
save.option-custom-scale-description: Download image up to 500% of original size.
save.license: This Streetmix-created image may be reused anywhere, for any purpose, under the {licenseLink} license.
save.error-preview: There was an error displaying a preview image.
save.error-unavailable: Saving to image is not available on this browser.
save.error-too-large: This image is too big and we were not able to create it. Please try a smaller custom size.

geotag.geotag-unavailable: Geocoding services are currently unavailable. You can view the map, but you won’t be able to change this street’s location.

donate.heading: Streetmix needs your help!
donate.lede: Streetmix is a community-supported project. Unlike other “free” services on the Internet, we do not show ads or inject trackers that abuse your privacy. Instead, we depend on your support to keep Streetmix up and running.
donate.text: Please consider supporting us with a one-time or recurring contribution. Your donation will pay for our servers and cloud infrastructure, supporting other non-profits, advocacy groups, and students working to improve our streets. Additional revenue will be invested into further development of new features. Our expenses are completely transparent, so you can see exactly how your contributions are used by the Streetmix team.

sign-in.heading: Sign in / Sign up
sign-in.description: Save your first design or sign in to access your past designs.
sign-in.email-description: We’ll send you a link to sign in. No password is required.
sign-in.email-invalid: Oops! That didn’t look like a valid email address. Please try again.
sign-in.tos: By clicking one of these buttons, I agree to the {tosLink} and {privacyLink}.
sign-in.sent-message-with-email: We’ve sent an email to {email}. Please follow the instructions there to continue signing in!

whatsnew.heading: What’s new in Streetmix?
whatsnew.english-only: This information is provided in English only.

newsletter.heading: Subscribe to our newsletter
newsletter.description: We send occasional email updates through our newsletter, just several times a year. Sign up to ensure you don’t miss a thing!
newsletter.ok-message: Thank you! You’re almost subscribed. We’ve sent you an email to confirm your address. Click it and you’re in!
newsletter.error-message: Uh oh! Something went wrong with the subscription process. This might be a temporary system error. Please try again later!

prompt.delete-street: Are you sure you want to permanently delete {streetName}? This cannot be undone.

toast.no-save: No need to save by hand; Streetmix automatically saves your street!
toast.remixing: Now editing a freshly-made duplicate of the original street. The duplicate has been put in your gallery.
toast.remixing-sign-in: Now editing a freshly-made duplicate of the original street. Sign in to start your own gallery of streets.
toast.reloaded: Your street was reloaded from the server as it was modified elsewhere.

tooltip.increase-width: Increase width (hold Shift for more precision)
tooltip.decrease-width: Decrease width (hold Shift for more precision)

warnings.does-not-fit: This segment doesn’t fit within the street.
warnings.not-wide: This segment might not be wide enough.
warnings.too-wide: This segment might be too wide.
warnings.dangerous: This segment represents a dangerous existing condition.

meta.description: Design, remix, and share your neighborhood street – all in your browser! Add trees or bike paths, widen sidewalks or traffic lanes, learn how your decisions can impact your community.

prompt.text: This feature is only available to Streetmix+ users.

web-monetization.not-signed-in: Your browser is sending Web Monetization payments. Sign in now to access your Streetmix+ benefits!
web-monetization.signed-in: Your Web Monetization subscription gives you full access to Streetmix+ benefits.

prompt.intro: Pardon the interruption. We’d love your feedback on this street.
prompt.joyful: Would you say this street feels joyful?

sentiment.sign-in-prompt: Please sign in now to make your voice heard.
sentiment.about-text: This survey helps us learn how people feel about streets.
sentiment.about-header: We want to understand how people feel about streets

about-article.paragraph-1: Many streets are designed by civil engineers, but we believe that design should include everyone’s point of view. In partnership with the New Urban Mobility Alliance (NUMO), we’re conducting this one-question survey to do just that.
about-article.paragraph-2: We will analyze your responses so that we can infer which street characteristics will induce which feelings. In the future, we plan to incorporate these insights back into design recommendations for Streetmix users.
about-article.paragraph-3: You can only vote once per street, but you can encourage others to cast their own vote by sharing your streets or a random street with the link https://streetmix.net/survey/.
